comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Bulletin, American National Red Cross, Volume 1 books.google.com/books?id=YPYAAAAAYAAJ&pg=PA14&lp... indicates that a Chas L. Magee was Secretary of the Red Cross in 1906 And in 1915, he was still in the job, although using "Charles" instead of "Chas" The American Red Cross magazine, Volume 10 books.google.com/books?id=OYdBAAAAYAAJ&pg=PA385&l... georgewbush-whitehouse.archives.gov/history/eeobtour/room... has a picture of Magee and Mabel Boardman (too small for recognition, but compatible with the guy here).
